about.I-am-a-Fullstack-Developer: I am a Fullstack Web Developer

contact.name: Name

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.laposte: During this internship, I improved ergonomics of the intranet site. I created a web supervision screen for production site. This interface allows you to track the current state of mail sorting machine.
experiences.po: During my internship at Price Observatory, I developed an interface which shows price changes. This interface included some options like filtering, exporting and pagination. I also improved chrome extension Price Observatory and configured crawlers to retrieve precise information on Websites.
experiences.proxiel: Developer an application in the telecom field.

projects.title: Apps I've Built
projects.subtitle: Here u can check out some projects that I've built or participated during my formation or my freetime.
projects.chatapp: A simple chat application which allow you to join a room and chat with other people.
projects.dikoapp: A simple dictionnary application which allows you to find word's information. This application uses data provided by http://www.jeuxdemots.org/jdm-accueil.php.
projects.ecommerceapp: This project is about a simple ecommerce site and a dashboard providing all basic ecommerce's features.
projects.foodrecipeapp: A simple responsive blog allows you to create, read, update, delete an article. You can try it out using this account admin@blog.com & password: 123456.
projects.tamtracking: This project is about a simple interface allow you to track tam's time per stop.
